price: And leave the sea parted[7]; for they are surely an army destined to drown.”
arabic: وَٱتۡرُكِ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ رَهۡوًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّغۡرَقُونَ
footnotes: [7] i.e., calm and still, in order that Pharaoh and his soldiers would follow you and be drowned.
